table.style: padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.name},
Thank you for signing up with IAC Lahore, Admission portal. Your account has been created. For your reference, please save this email as it contains your account details.
Login ID: ${object.login}
Please log in to your account and update your profile. For any query regarding the admission process, please email on ${object.company_id.admission_mail} or contact on telephone No. ${object.company_id.admission_phone} .
We wish you the best of luck.
Regards,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.name},
Your fee voucher has been uploaded on ${object.company_id.short_name|safe} Admission portal. You will be informed when it will be verified by concerned bank and ${object.company_id.short_name|safe} Treasurer Office which may take 1-2 working days. After verification of fee voucher, you will be able to proceed to next steps required for submission of application.
Regards,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.name},
Your registration fee Rs.${object.voucher_amount}/- has been verified by the Bank and ${object.company_id.short_name|safe} Treasurer Office. Kindly login to your account on ${object.company_id.short_name|safe} Admission portal and proceed further to complete remaining steps for the submission of your application successfully.
Regards,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.name},
Your registration fee USD 100/- has been verified by the Bank and ${object.company_id.short_name|safe} Treasurer Office. Kindly login to your account on ${object.company_id.short_name|safe} Admission portal and proceed further to complete remaining steps for the submission of your application successfully.
Regards,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.name},
Your application processing fee has not been verified by the bank and ${object.company_id.short_name|safe} Treasurer Office. Kindly upload your paid voucher so that can proceed further to complete remaining steps for the submission of your application successfully.
Regards,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.name},
We are pleased to confirm that your application has been submitted successfully. Please keep on visiting our website and your account for knowing about latest updates related to Admission process.
Best of Luck.
Regards,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.name},
It is for your information that those students who have deposited admissions Processing fee in their respective bank (NBP) are kindly requested to upload their fee voucher to university online admission portal using your username and password in order to confirm your admission , otherwise your admission form will not be Processed.
Regards,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.name},
It is for your information that your Form is submitted with out Fee Voucher kindly requested to Download their fee voucher and then upload to university online admission portal using your username and password in order to confirm your admission , otherwise your admission form will not be Processed.
Regards,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.name},
We are pleased to inform that your application for the admission in BS 4 Years Program at IAC Lahore due to non Completion of your academics details(i.e Matric and Intermediate or equivalent).You are kindly requested to please login your admission portal using your user ID /Password and insert the missing details as mentioned above. in order to process your application for admission at IAC. Please feel free to contact us.
Thanks and Regards,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
